title: ESIC Bihar Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in interview for 15 Senior Resident Posts
description: The Employees' State Insurance Corporation Bihar (ESIC Bihar) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 15 Senior Resident Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their Diploma, MBBS, and Post-graduation can apply for the ESIC Bihar Recruitment 2025. The interested applicants can attend the interview.
